languages.text: "К слову, во время службы тюремщиком я добился сокращения запасов воздушных фильтров, чтобы мир сильнее зависел от внешних поставок. Так что с каждым вдохом бунтовщики все ближе к смерти — буквально".

"Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."
languages.original_text: "К слову, во время службы тюремщиком я добился сокращения запасов воздушных фильтров, чтобы мир сильнее зависел от внешних поставок. Так что с каждым вдохом бунтовщики все ближе к смерти — буквально".

traits.locale_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

"Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

languages.text: "Ich habe während meiner Zeit als Wärter übrigens erfolgreich für die Zerstörung der Luftfilter-Reserven plädiert, um die Welt abhängiger von externen Ressourcen zu machen. Das heißt, jeder Atemzug bringt die Rebellen dem Tod näher ... buchstäblich."
languages.original_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe während meiner Zeit als Wärter übrigens erfolgreich für die Zerstörung der Luftfilter-Reserven plädiert, um die Welt abhängiger von externen Ressourcen zu machen. Das heißt, jeder Atemzug bringt die Rebellen dem Tod näher ... buchstäblich."

languages.text: "Yeri gelmişken... Gardiyanlık yaptığım süre boyunca hava filtresi rezervlerinin azaltılması için yaptığım müracaat kabul edildi, bu da dünyayı dış tedariklere daha bağımlı hâle getirdi. Dolayısıyla isyancıların aldığı her nefes, onları kelimenin tam anlamıyla ölüme bir adım daha yaklaştıracak."
languages.original_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

traits.locale_text: "Yeri gelmişken... Gardiyanlık yaptığım süre boyunca hava filtresi rezervlerinin azaltılması için yaptığım müracaat kabul edildi, bu da dünyayı dış tedariklere daha bağımlı hâle getirdi. Dolayısıyla isyancıların aldığı her nefes, onları kelimenin tam anlamıyla ölüme bir adım daha yaklaştıracak."

languages.text: «A propósito, durante mis días de carcelero logré que se redujesen las reservas de filtros de aire, haciendo así que el planeta dependiese más de los envíos de suministros. De este modo, cada bocanada de aire que inspiren los rebeldes los acerca un poco más a la muerte... literalmente».
languages.original_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

traits.locale_text: «A propósito, durante mis días de carcelero logré que se redujesen las reservas de filtros de aire, haciendo así que el planeta dependiese más de los envíos de suministros. De este modo, cada bocanada de aire que inspiren los rebeldes los acerca un poco más a la muerte... literalmente».

languages.text: “顺便说一句，我之前在这里担任看守期间，顺利削减了空气过滤器的储备，让这个世界更加依赖外部供应。可以说，那些叛乱分子每呼吸一口空气，就会离死亡更近一步，就是字面意义上的意思。”
languages.original_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

traits.locale_text: “顺便说一句，我之前在这里担任看守期间，顺利削减了空气过滤器的储备，让这个世界更加依赖外部供应。可以说，那些叛乱分子每呼吸一口空气，就会离死亡更近一步，就是字面意义上的意思。”

languages.text: « Lorsque j'étais geôlier, je suis parvenu à diviser par deux les réserves de filtres à air, rendant par là le monde plus dépendant des ravitaillements issus de l'extérieur. Ainsi, chaque inspiration des rebelles les rapproche davantage de la mort... littéralement. »
languages.original_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque j'étais geôlier, je suis parvenu à diviser par deux les réserves de filtres à air, rendant par là le monde plus dépendant des ravitaillements issus de l'extérieur. Ainsi, chaque inspiration des rebelles les rapproche davantage de la mort... littéralement. »

languages.text: 「ちなみに、看守だった頃、空気フィルターの予備を大幅に減らす申請を通した。おかげで、この世界は外部からの補給にさらに頼るしかなくなった。だから反乱どもは、息をするたびに死に一歩近づく。文字通りだ」
languages.original_text: "Incidentally, during my time as a jailer, I successfully petitioned for air filter reserves to be slashed, making the world more dependent on outside supplies. Thus, every breath the rebels take edges them closer to death — literally."

traits.locale_text: 「ちなみに、看守だった頃、空気フィルターの予備を大幅に減らす申請を通した。おかげで、この世界は外部からの補給にさらに頼るしかなくなった。だから反乱どもは、息をするたびに死に一歩近づく。文字通りだ。」
